member.name: M:ApiDPSystem.Controllers.FileController.GetCarsByFilterInJson(ApiDPSystem.Models.Filter)
member.summary: Create JSON with cars info for certain dealer by any condition Category: 0,1 - all | 2 - sold | 3 - actual
member.param: Category: 0 - all cars for dealer 1 - all filters 2 - only sold cars 3 - only actual cars Dealer Name
